pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, June 8, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a statement in the House of Commons on the recent tragedy in London, Ontario.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#

London, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a vigil outside the London Muslim Mosque for the victims of the deadly attack in London, Ontario.
